entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
